Project Roles¶

The business logic of CONTACT Projects is completely based on the project roles Project Manager and Project Member.

Important

It is strongly recommended that you use the roles of Project Manager and Project Member.

Renaming a project role ==========select=============

For example, if you want to rename the german name of the role Projektleiter to Projectmanager, proceed as follows:

  1. Log on to the system as a system administrator
  2. Navigate to Administration/Configuration ‣ Administration ‣ Roles & Access Rights ‣ Other ‣ Project Specific Roles & Acces Rights ‣ Project Roles Catalog
  3. Search for Role ID Projektleiter
  4. Result list contains exactly one record
  5. Open the context menu by selecting the record and clicking the right mouse button
  6. Open the master data by clicking Modify
  7. Open the editor by clicking the globe symbol on the right side of the field Name
  8. Change the value of the field German (de)
  9. Confirm your input by clicking the button Ok
  10. Confirm your changes by clicking the button Modify

Now you changed the german name of the role.
